</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.2.1
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>dex1021.htm
<DESCRIPTION>FIRST AMENDMENT TO OCTOBER 19, 2005 CREDIT AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>First Amendment to October 19, 2005 Credit Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.2.1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FOIA CONFIDENTIAL </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TREATMENT REQUESTED </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT [HSH/AS B737-8001] </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>THIS AMENDMENT NO. 1
TO CREDIT AGREEMENT</B>, dated as of March&nbsp;27, 2007 (this &#147;<B>Amendment</B>&#148;), is to the Credit Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;19, 2005 (the &#147;<B>Credit Agreement</B>&#148;), among (i)&nbsp;<B>ALASKA AIRLINES, INC</B>., an
Alaska corporation (the &#147;<B>Borrower</B>&#148;), (ii)&nbsp;<B>EACH LOAN PARTICIPANT IDENTIFIED ON SCHEDULE I HERETO</B>, and (iii)&nbsp;<B>HSH NORDBANK AG NEW YORK BRANCH</B>, as the Security Agent acting on behalf of the Loan Participants (the
&#147;<B>Security Agent</B>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>W I T N E S S E T H: </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the parties hereto have previously entered into the Credit Agreement; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the parties hereto desire to amend the Credit Agreement in certain respects as provided herein. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW THEREFORE</B>, in consideration of the mutual agreements contained herein, the parties hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 1 <U>Defined Terms</U>. Unless otherwise amended by the terms of this Amendment, terms used in this Amendment shall have the meanings assigned in
the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 2 <U>Amendments to Credit Agreement</U>. This Amendment shall be effective as of March&nbsp;30, 2007 (the
&#147;<B>Amendment Effective Date</B>&#148;), provided that the conditions precedent in Section&nbsp;3 has been satisfied to the satisfaction of the Loan Participants and the Security Agent. From the Amendment Effective Date, the Credit Agreement
(and to the extent of an amendment to the definitions in Annex A to the Credit Agreement, Annex A to each other document between the parties) shall be amended as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) Section&nbsp;2.2(a) of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The Borrower agrees to give the Security Agent at least five (5)&nbsp;Business Days&#146; prior written notice (the &#147;<B>Funding
Notice</B>&#148;) of the Borrowing Date for each Advance, which Borrowing Date shall be a Business Day not later than the Commitment Termination Date and, in respect of an Advance, shall be either (i)&nbsp;the last Business Day of the calendar month
in which the Borrower paid the Manufacturer in respect of such Advance, in accordance with the scheduled dates therefor set forth in Schedule III, or (ii)&nbsp;the last Business Day of any subsequent calendar month provided that the Aircraft the
subject of such Advance is able to be the subject of a Drawing on such Business Day as contemplated in Schedule III and the Borrower has previously paid the Manufacturer in respect of such Advance, including its Cash Contribution. The Funding Notice
shall specify any funding instructions and shall be in substantially the form of Exhibit A.&#148; </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Section&nbsp;2.2(b) of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;In the event that any Drawing shall not be consummated in accordance with the terms hereof on the
Borrowing Date specified in a Funding Notice, the Loan Participants and the Borrower shall cooperate with each other to arrange a mutually acceptable postponement of such date provided that such date may not be later than the last Business Day of
the third month following the month in which the Advance to which the Drawing relates is scheduled to occur as set forth in Schedule&nbsp;III. (the &#147;<B>Delayed Borrowing Date</B>&#148;). In the event that the Drawing shall not be consummated in
accordance with the terms hereof by 11 :00 a.m. (New York time) on the Delayed Borrowing Date or, if earlier, the date on which the Borrower notifies the Loan Participants that the Drawing will not occur, the Loan Participant may cancel or terminate
any funding arrangements that they may have made to enable them to fund their Commitments and the Borrower shall pay to each Loan Participant on demand their Break Amount (as reasonably determined by such Loan Participants and certified to the
Borrower). In consideration of making their funds available on the specified Borrowing Date, the Borrower shall compensate the Loan Participants for their net loss of earnings on such funds, by paying the Loan Participants interest on the aggregate
amount thereof (calculated on the basis of a 360-day year and actual days elapsed) at a rate equal to the Loan Participants&#146; cost of funds for the period from and including the specified Borrowing Date to but excluding the earlier of
(x)&nbsp;the Business Day on which the Borrowing shall actually occur, (y)&nbsp;the Business Day on which the Borrower shall notify the Loan Participants that the Borrowing will not occur prior to the Delayed Borrowing Date (if such notice is given
prior to 10:00 a.m. (New York time) or if later, until the Business Day subsequent to such notice date), or (z)&nbsp;the Delayed Borrowing Date.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Section&nbsp;2.3 of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;On the Borrowing Date for each Drawing specified in a Funding Notice referred to in Section&nbsp;2.2(a), subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, each Loan Participant, through or on behalf of the Security Agent, agrees
to pay the amount of its Commitment for each such Advance directly to the Borrower by wiring such amounts to the account or accounts specified in such Funding Notice.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Section&nbsp;2.4 of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The Borrower agrees that the actual transfer of the proceeds of Drawings to the bank designated by the Borrower shall constitute conclusive evidence
that the Drawings were made, and neither the failure of any Holder to endorse on the schedule attached to any Loan Certificate the amount of its Drawing, nor any failure of the bank designated by the Borrower to credit proceeds of a Drawing to the
Borrower&#146;s account maintained at such bank shall affect the Borrower&#146;s obligations hereunder.&#148; </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) Section&nbsp;4.2(c) of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The Borrower shall have paid to the Manufacturer the Advance the subject of the Drawing, including its
Cash Contribution.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f) Section&nbsp;5.2(d) of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to
read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The principal of the Drawings of each Series shall be due and payable in full upon the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the last
Business Day of the month (being an Interest Payment Date) preceding the month in which Delivery Date of the Aircraft related to such Series shall occur, as notified by the Borrower to the Security Agent five (5)&nbsp;Business Days prior to such
day, and (ii)&nbsp;the Final Repayment Date.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g) Section&nbsp;5.10(a) of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended and
restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;On at least five Business Days prior written notice, the Borrower may prepay on the date
specified in such notice of prepayment, in whole or in part, the Loan Certificates then outstanding at the principal amount thereof (or portion thereof to be repaid), and provided that any partial prepayment shall be in an aggregate original
principal amount of at least $5,000,000 and in $500,000 multiples thereof, and the amount thereof shall be specified in such written notice. The Security Agent will give prompt notice of the Borrower&#146;s intent to prepay to the Holders. As long
as the Borrower is entitled to borrow against any such Aircraft hereunder, Borrower may re-borrow the amount prepaid as permitted in Section&nbsp;2.2(a) hereof.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(h) Section&nbsp;9 of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new Section (i)&nbsp;which provides: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>&#147;Manufacturer&#146;s change of Month of Aircraft Delivery.</U> In the event that the Manufacturer reschedules the Scheduled Delivery Date of an
Aircraft so that it changes the month in which the Aircraft will be delivered to the Borrower, the Borrower shall promptly notify the Security Agent. If the Borrower so notifies the Security Agent, Schedule&nbsp;III may be amended by the agreement
of all parties hereto to reflect the changed Scheduled Delivery Date of such Aircraft.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) Schedule III to the Credit
Agreement is hereby replaced with a new Schedule III in the form of Schedule&nbsp;II. </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(j) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Amendment Effective Date&#148; in the
appropriate alphabetical position as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Amendment Effective Date</U>&#148; means March&nbsp;30, 2007, being the date
of Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement [HSH/AS B737-800] among the Borrower, the Security Agent and each Loan Participant identified on Schedule 1 thereto.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(k) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Borrowing Date&#148; is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Borrowing Date</U>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the Effective Date, and (b)&nbsp;a day on or before the Commitment Termination Date
that is either (i)&nbsp;the last Business Day of a calendar month on which an Advance is payable in respect of an Aircraft under the Boeing Purchase Agreement as set forth in Schedule III to the Credit Agreement, or (ii)&nbsp;the last Business Day
of a subsequent calendar month, as specified by the Borrower in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.2(a), provided that the Aircraft the subject of such Advance is able to be the subject of a Drawing on such Business Day as contemplated in
Schedule&nbsp;III.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(l) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Commitment Fee&#148; is hereby amended and restated in its
entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Commitment Fee</U>&#148; means a fee calculated monthly (but, for the avoidance of doubt,
payable quarterly) by multiplying the Commitment Fee Percentage by the outstanding unutilized Maximum Commitment of each Loan Participant, as cancelled or reduced under Section&nbsp;3.5 of the Credit Agreement.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(m) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Commitment Fee Percentage&#148; in the appropriate alphabetical position as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Commitment Fee Percentage</U>&#148; means, for the purposes of calculating the Commitment Fee: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) if 0% of the Maximum Borrowing Capacity is being utilized, 0.65%&nbsp;per annum; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) if more than 0% but equal to or less than 15% of the Maximum Borrowing Capacity is being utilized, 0.60%&nbsp;per annum; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) if more than 15% but equal to or less than 25% of the Maximum Borrowing Capacity is being utilized, 0.55%&nbsp;per annum;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) if more than 25% but equal to or less than 60% of the Maximum Borrowing Capacity is being utilized, 0.5%&nbsp;per
annum; and </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) if more than 60% of the Maximum Borrowing Capacity is being utilized,
0.42%&nbsp;per annum.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(n) In Annex A, , the definition of &#147;Commitment Termination Date&#148; is hereby amended
and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Commitment Termination Date</U>&#148; means the last Business Day of the
calendar month of the last Advance specified in Schedule III to the Credit Agreement, however, if an Excusable Delay (as defined in the Boeing Purchase Agreement) occurs, or if any other delay occurs which does not result in a termination of either
Purchase Agreement or an Event of Default hereunder, then the Commitment Termination Date may be a date not more than 90 days after such date, or as extended by agreement of all Loan Participants.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(o) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Interest Payment Date&#148; is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Interest Payment Date</U>&#148; means each Interest Payment Date occurring prior to the Amendment Effective Date, then
April&nbsp;1, 2007 and thereafter the last day of each month occurring after the Amendment Effective Date, provided that, if any such date shall not be a Business Day, then the relevant Interest Payment Date shall be the immediately preceding
Business Day (the last Business Day of the Month).&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(p) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Maximum Borrowing
Capacity&#148; in the appropriate alphabetical position as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Maximum Borrowing Capacity</U>&#148; means, in respect
of any month, that part of the Maximum Commitment that can be utilized by the Borrower to fund deliveries, as specified in Schedule III to the Credit Agreement.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 3 <U>Condition Precedent</U>. The effectiveness of this Amendment is subject to the receipt by the Security Agent of a certificate of the Secretary or an Assistant Secretary of the Borrower as to the
incumbency and specimen signature of the officer of the Borrower who shall have executed this Amendment on behalf of the Borrower on or about the date hereof, which shall be satisfactory to the Security Agent in form and substance. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 4 <U>Scope and Effectiveness of Amendment</U>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) This Amendment and the agreements set forth herein shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns from and after the Amendment Effective Date. This
Amendment shall not have retroactive effect and the original provisions contained in the Credit Agreement shall apply up to the Amendment Effective Date. </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) On and after the Amendment Effective Date (i)&nbsp;this Amendment shall become a
part of the Credit Agreement, and (ii)&nbsp;each reference in (x)&nbsp;the Credit Agreement to &#147;this Agreement&#148;, &#147;hereof&#146; or &#147;hereunder&#148; or words of like import, and (y)&nbsp;any other Operative Document to the
&#147;Credit Agreement&#148;, shall be a reference to the Credit Agreement, as amended or modified hereby. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Except as
expressly amended or modified hereby, the Credit Agreement, as amended prior to the date hereof, shall remain in full force and effect and is hereby ratified and confirmed by the parties hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Each party hereto agrees and acknowledges that this Amendment constitutes an &#147;Operative Document&#148; under the Credit
Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 5 <U>Miscellaneous</U>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.1 <U>Notices</U>. Section&nbsp;10 of the Credit Agreement shall apply hereto as if set out in full in this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.2 <U>Successors and Assigns</U>. This Amendment shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.3 <U>Expenses</U>. The Borrower agrees to pay the costs and expenses of the Security Agent and the Lenders, including reasonable fees and expenses of
Vedder, Price, Kaufman&nbsp;&amp; Kammholz, P.C. in connection with the negotiation, preparation, execution and delivery of this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">5.4 <U>Captions</U>. Captions and section headings appearing herein are included solely for convenience of reference and are not intended to affect the interpretation of any provision of this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.5 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same
instrument and any of the parties hereto may execute this Amendment by signing any such counterpart. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.6 <U>Governing Law; Consent to
Jurisdiction; Waiver of Jury Trial</U>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) &#145;This Agreement shall in all respects be governed by, and construed in
accordance with, the law of the State of New York. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Each party hereby irrevocably and unconditionally submits, for
itself and its property, to the nonexclusive jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of the State of New York sitting in New York County and of the United States District Court of the Southern District of New York, and any appellate court from any
thereof, in any action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement, or for recognition or enforcement of any judgment, and each of the parties hereto hereby irrevocably and unconditionally agrees that all claims in respect of any such
action or proceeding may be heard and determined in such New York State or, to the extent permitted by law, in such Federal court. Each of the parties hereto agrees that a final judgment in any such action or proceeding shall be conclusive and may
be enforced in other jurisdictions </FONT>
</P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">by suit on the judgment or in any other manner provided by law. Nothing in this Agreement shall affect any right that any party may otherwise have to bring
any action or proceeding relating to this Agreement against another party or its properties in the courts of any jurisdiction. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(c) Each party hereby irrevocably and unconditionally waives, to the fullest extent it may legally and effectively do so, any objection which it may now or hereafter have to the laying of venue of any suit, action or proceeding arising out
of or relating to this Agreement in any court referred to in Section&nbsp;56(b). Each of the parties hereto hereby irrevocably waives, to the fullest extent permitted by law, the defense of an inconvenient forum to the maintenance of such action or
proceeding in any such court. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Each party to this Agreement irrevocably consents to service of process in the manner
provided for notices in Section&nbsp;10 of the Credit Agreement. Nothing in this Agreement will affect the right of any party to this Agreement to serve process in any other manner permitted by law. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) EACH PARTY HERETO HEREBY WAIVES, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, ANY RIGHT IT MAY HAVE TO A TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY
LEGAL PROCEEDING DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED HEREBY (WHETHER BASED ON CONTRACT, TORT OR ANY OTHER THEORY). EACH PARTY HERETO (A)&nbsp;CERTIFIES THAT NO REPRESENTATIVE, AGENT OR
ATTORNEY OF ANY OTHER PARTY HAS REPRESENTED, EXPRESSLY OR OTHERWISE, THAT SUCH OTHER PARTY WOULD NOT, IN THE EVENT OF LITIGATION, SEEK TO ENFORCE THE FOREGOING WAIVER AND (B)&nbsp;ACKNOWLEDGES THAT IT AND THE OTHER PARTIES HERETO HAVE BEEN INDUCED
TO ENTER INTO THIS AGREEMENT BY, AMONG OTHER THINGS, THE MUTUAL WAIVERS AND CERTIFICATION IN THIS SECTION. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 6 <U>Direction</U>. The
Lenders direct the Security Agent to execute this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Signatures Follow] </FONT></P>

STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SCHEDULE II </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1) In regard to any amounts that exceed the aggregate Maximum Commitment of (a)&nbsp;US$172,000,000 at any time during the term of the Facility, the Lenders are not required to fund more than US$172,000,000 in total.
The Borrower will be required to advance any difference in cash until the Facility decreases below the aggregate Maximum Commitment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"

<DESCRIPTION>SECOND AMENDMENT TO OCTOBER 19, 2005 CREDIT AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Second Amendment to October 19, 2005 Credit Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.2.2 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>FOIA CONFIDENTIAL </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TREATMENT REQUESTED </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AMENDMENT NO. 2 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT [HSH/AS B737-8001] </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>THIS AMENDMENT NO. 2
TO CREDIT AGREEMENT</B>, dated as of November&nbsp;26, 2007 (this &#147;<B>Amendment</B>&#148;), is to the Credit Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;19, 2005 (as amended and supplemented from time to time, the &#147;<B>Credit Agreement</B>&#148;),
among (i)&nbsp;<B>ALASKA AIRLINES, INC</B>., an Alaska corporation (the &#147;<B>Borrower</B>&#148;), (ii)&nbsp;<B>EACH LOAN PARTICIPANT IDENTIFIED ON SCHEDULE I HERETO</B>, and (iii)&nbsp;<B>HSH NORDBANK AG NEW YORK BRANCH</B>, as the Security
Agent acting on behalf of the Loan Participants (the &#147;<B>Security Agent</B>&#148;), as amended by Amendment No 1 to Credit Agreement dated as of March&nbsp;27, 2007 among the Borrower, each Loan Participant and the Security Agent. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>W I T N E S S E T H: </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the parties hereto have previously entered into the Credit Agreement; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the parties hereto
desire to amend the Credit Agreement in certain respects as provided herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW THEREFORE</B>, in consideration of the mutual
agreements contained herein, the parties hereto agree as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 1 <U>Defined Terms</U>. Unless otherwise amended the terms of
this Amendment, terms used in this Amendment shall have the meanings assigned in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 2 <U>Amendments to Credit
Agreement</U>. This Amendment shall be effective as of November&nbsp;26, 2007 (the &#147;<B>Amendment Effective Date</B>&#148;), provided that all Loan Participants, the Borrower and the Security Agent have signed this Amendment and the conditions
precedent in Section&nbsp;3 have been satisfied to the satisfaction of the Loan Participants and the Security Agent. From the Amendment Effective Date, the Credit Agreement (and to the extent of an amendment to the definitions in Annex A to the
Credit Agreement, Annex A to each other document between the parties) shall be amended as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) Section&nbsp;3.6 of
the Credit Agreement shall be amended and restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;3.6 <U>Non Continuing Loan
Participant</U>. (a)&nbsp;Provided that no Event of Default is continuing, on August&nbsp;31, 2009, or if such day is not a Business Day, on the next preceding Business Day (the &#147;<B>Non Continuing Repayment Date</B>&#148;), all Drawings made by
the Non Continuing Loan Participant (together with accrued interest and any other amounts due and owing to the Non Continuing Loan Participant) shall be repaid by the Borrower to the Non Continuing Loan Participant Upon receipt of payment, the Non
Continuing Loan Participant&#146;s Commitment shall be cancelled and, if requested by the Borrower, the Non Continuing Loan Participant shall return or cancel its Loan Certificate. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) On and from cancellation of the Non Continuing Loan Participant&#146;s
Commitment, and repayment of the Non Continuing Loan Participant&#146;s Drawings, the aggregate Maximum Commitment of the Loan Participants under the Operative Documents and the Facility Amount shall be reduced to US$152,000,000, as if the Borrower
had canceled such Facility Amount accordance with Section&nbsp;3.5. The Maximum Commitment of each Continuing Loan Participant shall be unchanged. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Unless the Borrower gives notice to the Continuing Loan Participants five
Business Days prior to the Non Continuing Repayment Date, on the Non Continuing Repayment Date, provided that no Event of Default is continuing, the Borrower shall make a Drawing from the Continuing Loan Participants in an amount equal to the
principal amount of the Drawing repaid by the Borrower to the Non Continuing Loan Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.6(a) on Non Continuing Repayment Date, or such lesser amount such that no more than the aggregate Maximum Commitment applying on
and from the Non Continuing Repayment Date is outstanding. Subject to satisfaction of the conditions precedent specified in Sections 4.2 of the Credit Agreement, such Drawing shall be made available by each Continuing Loan Participant in accordance
with their Participation Percentage. If the Borrower fails to repay the Non Continuing Loan Participant on the Non Continuing Repayment Date then no Drawing shall be made by a Continuing Loan Participant and the Borrower shall pay any Break Costs
associated with a Continuing Loan Participant&#146;s failed Drawing in accordance herewith&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) In Schedule I to the
Credit Agreement, each occurrence of the following contact details: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>[***]*</B> </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">shall be replaced with the following: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>[***]*</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="line-height:8px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000;width:10%">&nbsp;</P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indicates that certain information contained herein has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Confidential treatment has been requested with
respect to the omitted portions. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Schedule III to the Credit Agreement is hereby replaced with a new Schedule III
in the form specified in Annex A hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Loan Participant&#148; is hereby amended
and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Loan Participant</U>&#148; means those parties identified
in Schedule I to the Credit Agreement, and their successors and assigns, provided that, subject to repayment by the Borrower of the Non Continuing Loan Participant on the Non Continuing Repayment Date in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.6(a) of the
Credit Agreement, from the Non Continuing Repayment Date, the Non Continuing Loan Participant shall not be a Loan Participant.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(d) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Continuing Loan Participant&#148; in the appropriate alphabetical position as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Continuing Loan Participant</U>&#148; means each Loan Participant other than the Non Continuing Loan Participant.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Facility Amount&#148; shall be amended and restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Facility Amount</U>&#148; means $172,000,000, or such lesser amount as is specified in Schedule III to the Credit
Agreement, as cancelled or reduced by the Borrower under Section&nbsp;3.5 or Section&nbsp;3.6(a) of the Credit Agreement &#147; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(f) In Annex A, the definition of &#147;Final Repayment Date&#148; shall be amended and restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Final Repayment Date</U>&#148; means, for the Non Continuing Loan Participant, the Non Continuing Repayment Date, and, for the Continuing Loan Participants, August&nbsp;31, 2011.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Non Continuing Loan Participant&#148; in the appropriate alphabetical position as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Non Continuing Loan Participant</U>&#148; means Kaupthing Bank hf. and its assigns.&#148; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(h) In Annex A, add a new definition of &#147;Non Continuing Repayment Date&#148; in the appropriate alphabetical position as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;&#147;<U>Non Continuing Repayment Date</U>&#148; has the meaning given in Section&nbsp;36(a) of the Credit
Agreement.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 3 <U>Condition Precedent</U>. The effectiveness of this Amendment is subject to the receipt by the Security Agent
of a certificate of the Secretary or an Assistant Secretary of the Borrower as to the incumbency and specimen signature of the officer of the Borrower who shall have executed this Amendment on behalf of the Borrower on or about the date hereof,
which shall be satisfactory to the Security Agent in form and substance. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 4 <U>Scope and Effectiveness of Amendment</U>. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) This Amendment and the agreements set forth herein shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their
respective successors and assigns from and after the Amendment Effective Date. This Amendment shall not have retroactive effect and the original provisions contained in the Credit Agreement shall apply up to the Amendment Effective Date. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) On and after the Amendment Effective Date (i)&nbsp;this Amendment shall become a part of the Credit Agreement (ii)&nbsp;each
reference in (x)&nbsp;the Credit Agreement to &#147;this Agreement&#148;, &#147;hereof&#146; or &#147;hereunder&#148; or words of like import, and (y)&nbsp;any other Operative Document to the &#147;Credit Agreement&#148;, shall be a reference to the
Credit Agreement, as amended or modified hereby. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Except as expressly amended or modified hereby, the Credit Agreement,
as amended prior to the date hereof, shall remain in full force aid effect and is hereby ratified and confirmed by the parties hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Each party hereto agrees and acknowledges that this Amendment constitutes an &#147;Operative Document&#148; under the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 5. <U>Miscellaneous</U>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.1
<U>Notices</U>. Section&nbsp;10 of the Credit Agreement shall apply hereto as if set out in full in this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.2 <U>Successors and
Assigns</U>. This Amendment shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.3 <U>Expenses</U>. The Borrower agrees to pay the costs and expenses of the Security Agent and the Lenders, including reasonable fees and expenses of Vedder, Price, Kaufman&nbsp;&amp; Kammholz, P.C. in connection
with the negotiation, preparation, execution and delivery of this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.4 <U>Captions</U>. Captions and section headings appearing
herein are included solely for convenience of reference and are not intended to affect the interpretation of any provision of this Amendment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">5.5 <U>Counterparts</U>. This Amendment may be executed in any number of counterparts, all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same instrument and any of the parties hereto may execute this Amendment by signing any such
counterpart. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.6 <U>Governing Law; Consent to Jurisdiction; Waiver of Jury Trial</U>. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) This Agreement shall in all respects be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the law of the State of New York. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Each party hereby irrevocably and unconditionally submits, for itself and its
property, to the nonexclusive jurisdiction of the Supreme Court of the State of New York sitting in New York County and of the United States District Court of the Southern District of New York, and any appellate court from any thereof, in any action
or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement, or for recognition or enforcement of any judgment, and each of the parties hereto hereby irrevocably and unconditionally agrees that all claims in respect of any such action or proceeding
may be heard and determined in such New York State or, to the extent permitted by law, in such Federal court. Each of the parties hereto agrees that a final judgment in any such action or proceeding shall be conclusive and may be enforced in other
jurisdictions by suit on the judgment or in any other manner provided by law. Nothing in this Agreement shall affect any right that any party may otherwise have to bring any action or proceeding relating to this Agreement against another party or
its properties in the courts of any jurisdiction. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) Each party hereby irrevocably and unconditionally waives, to the
fullest extent it may legally and effectively do so, any objection which it may now or hereafter have to the laying of venue of any suit, action or proceeding arising out of or relating to this Agreement in any court referred to in
Section&nbsp;56(b). Each of the parties hereto hereby irrevocably waives, to the fullest extent permitted by law, the defense of an inconvenient forum to the maintenance of such action or proceeding in any such court. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) Each party to this Agreement irrevocably consents to service of process in the manner provided for notices in Section&nbsp;10 of the
Credit Agreement. Nothing in this Agreement will affect the right of any party to this Agreement to serve process in any other manner permitted by law. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) EACH PARTY HERETO HEREBY WAIVES, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, ANY RIGHT IT MAY HAVE TO A TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY LEGAL PROCEEDING DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS
AGREEMENT OR THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED HEREBY (WHETHER BASED ON CONTRACT, TORT OR ANY OTHER THEORY). EACH PARTY HERETO (A)&nbsp;CERTIFIES THAT NO REPRESENTATIVE, AGENT OR ATTORNEY OF ANY OTHER PARTY HAS REPRESENTED, EXPRESSLY OR OTHERWISE, THAT
SUCH OTHER PARTY WOULD NOT, IN THE EVENT OF LITIGATION, SEEK TO ENFORCE THE FOREGOING WAIVER AND (B)&nbsp;ACKNOWLEDGES THAT IT AND THE OTHER PARTIES HERETO HAVE BEEN INDUCED TO ENTER INTO THIS AGREEMENT BY, AMONG OTHER THINGS, THE MUTUAL, WAIVERS
AND CERTIFICATIONS IN THIS SECTION. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section 6. <U>Direction</U>. The Lenders direct the Security Agent to execute this Amendment.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Signatures Follow] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6 </FONT></P>

<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>IN WITNESS WHEREOF</B>, the parties hereto have caused this Amendment to be duly executed by their
respective officers as of the day and year first above written. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P><DIV ALIGN="right">

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SCHEDULE I </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>LOAN PARTICIPANTS </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">HSH Nordbank AG New York Branch </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Norddeutsche Landesbank Girozentrale </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">DekaBank Deutsche Girozentrale </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">RZB Finance LLC </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Hypo Public Finance USA, Inc. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Kaupthing Bank hf. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement HSH/AS B737-800] </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ANNEX A </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(to Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to Credit Agreement) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SCHEDULE II TO CREDIT AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1) In regard to any amounts that exceed the aggregate Maximum Commitment of (a)&nbsp;US$172,000,000 until the Non Continuing Repayment Date, and (b)&nbsp;US$152,000,000
from the Non Continuing Repayment Date until the Final Repayment Date, at any time during the term of the Facility, the Lenders are not required to fund more than US$172,000,000 (prior to the Non Continuing Repayment Date) or US$152,000,000
(following the Non Continuing Repayment Date) in total. The Borrower will be required to advance any difference in cash until the Facility decreases below the aggregate Maximum Commitment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>[<U>***</U>]* </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P
STYLE="line-height:8px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000;width:10%">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">*</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indicates that certain information contained herein has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Confidential treatment has been requested with
respect to the omitted portions. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>


</BODY></HTML>
</TEXT>
</DOCUMENT>
<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.7
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>dex107.htm
<DESCRIPTION>ALASKA AIR GROUP PERFORMANCE BASED PAY PLAN
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Alaska Air Group Performance Based Pay Plan</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.7 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ALASKA AIR GROUP PERFORMANCE BASED PAY PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(formerly, the &#147;Management Incentive Plan&#148; or
&#147;MIP&#148;) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(Amended and Restated November&nbsp;30, 2007) </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board of Directors (the &#147;Board&#148;) of Alaska Air Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) has adopted a plan to reward employees of Alaska Airlines, Inc. (&#147;Alaska&#148;) and Horizon Air Industries, Inc.
(&#147;Horizon&#148;). The plan, formerly known as the Management Incentive Plan, has been renamed as the Performance Based Pay Plan (&#147;Plan&#148;). This memorandum is provided to explain the key elements of how the Plan will operate. The
Performance Based Pay award (&#147;Award&#148;) of each eligible Participant will depend upon the degree to which the Company achieves the performance goals and award modifier set by the Compensation Committee of the Board for each calendar year (a
&#147;Plan Year&#148;) and the discretion of the Compensation Committee of the Board and Chief Executive Officer explained below. This Plan is effective beginning with the 2003 Plan Year and each year thereafter until amended, restated or
terminated, pursuant to paragraph&nbsp;8. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ELIGIBILITY </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Eligibility to participate in the Plan
during a Plan Year is limited to officers and other employees of Alaska and Horizon who (a)&nbsp;are designated by the Compensation Committee, and (b)&nbsp;are full-time employees of Alaska or Horizon as of December&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year, or
(c)&nbsp;were full-time employees during the Plan Year and do not meet the requirement of (b)&nbsp;because their employment ended due to retirement at age 52 or older, disability or death (each a &#147;Participant,&#148; or collectively
&#147;Participants&#148;). Individuals may become Participants during the Plan Year if they are newly hired or promoted during the year and meet the requirements of the preceding sentence. Participants who are on temporary medical leave, military
leave, or otherwise not working either full-time or part-time for Alaska or Horizon for reasons approved by the Board, but who remain employed, also retain eligibility as Participants. Participation in the Plan does not guarantee that any Award will
be paid if applicable performance goals specified for the Plan Year are not achieved for the year. Unless otherwise provided for in a separate Award agreement, an individual whose employment with Alaska or Horizon ends for any reason not described
in (c)&nbsp;above, such as resignation or termination, forfeits eligibility upon such end of employment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BASIS FOR PARTICIPATION </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">A Participant&#146;s Basis
for a Plan Year is used to determine the dollar amount or initial target value of the Participant&#146;s Award for that year. The &#147;Basis&#148; is the actual Basic Salary of the Participant earned during the Plan Year multiplied by the
percentage selected for that Participant by the Board. &#147;Basic Salary&#148; means the compensation earned by the Participant for services performed for Alaska or Horizon, <B><I>including</I></B> amounts that the Participant could have received
in cash had the Participant not elected to contribute the amount to an employee benefit plan maintained by Alaska, Horizon or the Company and any other voluntary payment the Participant makes which reduces his/her compensation (such as the
Participant&#146;s voluntary contribution to an Internal Revenue Code (&#147;Code&#148;) Section&nbsp;401(k) Plan, Code Section&nbsp;125 medical account, dependent day care spending account, or charitable gift), but <B><I>excluding</I></B>
commissions, all awards (including any Award under this Plan), and all other forms of incentive or other supplemental pay, employee benefits paid by the employer (such as employer contributions to a Code Section&nbsp;401(k) Plan), cash and non-cash
fringe benefits and perquisites (such as auto allowance and travel </FONT>
</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">reimbursement). Awards may be paid in cash or by act of the Compensation Committee of the Board, the Company&#146;s Common Stock. Alternatively, Awards may,
by act of the Compensation Committee of the Board, be denominated in shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock that are subject to conditions and restrictions established by the Compensation Committee and based on the achievement of performance
goals as provided for in a Performance Share Award Agreement (such shares of Common Stock are referred to as &#147;Performance Shares&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>CALCULATION OF THE AWARD </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The size of the Award
earned for a Plan Year will depend upon the extent to which the performance goals and award modifier of the Company have been achieved during that Plan Year and the discretion of the Compensation Committee of the Board. Separate performance
weighting has been established for each performance goal. The Award will equal either (i)&nbsp;in the case of cash-based Awards, the dollar amount achieved by multiplying the Participant&#146;s Basis by the sum of the weighted percentage achievement
factors, or (ii)&nbsp;in the case of Common Stock Based Awards, the number of shares which is equal to the cash award under the preceding clause (i)&nbsp;divided by the closing price of the Company&#146;s Stock on the NYSE on the date of such Award,
or (iii)&nbsp;in the case of Awards denominated in Performance Shares, the actual number of shares of Common Stock earned by the Participant will be determined based on the achievement of performance goals as described in the applicable Performance
Share Award Agreement, in each case, as such amounts may be adjusted in the Compensation Committee&#146;s discretion pursuant to paragraph 6 or pursuant to the terms of an applicable Performance Share Award Agreement. All calculations will be
performed by the Human Resources Department of Alaska and will be subject to approval solely by the Board. Once approved by the Compensation Committee of the Board, such calculations shall be conclusively presumed to be accurate. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PERFORMANCE WEIGHTING </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In order to achieve any
Award for a particular performance goal, a &#147;Threshold&#148; must be achieved. A full entitlement is achieved when the &#147;Target&#148; is reached, and a double entitlement is possible if the &#147;Maximum&#148; is achieved. This weighting
applies to each goal individually. Once the Threshold is achieved, the percentage of the difference between the Threshold and Target achieved is multiplied by the weighting factor as specified in the attachment for the applicable Plan Year. If the
Target is exceeded, the percentage of the difference between the Target and the Maximum achieved is multiplied by the weighting factor as specified in the attachment for the applicable Plan Year. Since the difference between the Threshold and Target
is, in most cases, arithmetically different from the difference between the Target and the Maximum, calculations will be performed utilizing either the Threshold-Target range, or Target-Maximum range, as applicable, to locate the percentage of the
Target, or the percentage of the Maximum, as applicable, that has been achieved. Additional performance weighting criteria and the methodology for determining the number of shares issued to a Participant pursuant to an Award of Performance Shares
may be set forth or described in an applicable Performance Share Award Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>5.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PERFORMANCE GOALS AND APPLICABLE PERFORMANCE WEIGHTING FACTORS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Compensation Committee of the Board will establish the performance goals and award modifier for each Plan Year during the life of this Plan, and will provide an annex to this Plan that outlines goals, award
modifiers and the weighting factors. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 of 8 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>6.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>DISCRETIONARY FACTOR </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the case of a Participant
described in paragraph&nbsp;1(c) who retired due to age, terminated employment due to disability, or died during the year, or a Participant who took a leave of absence or worked a reduced schedule during any portion of the year, the Compensation
Committee of the Board retains absolute discretionary authority to adjust the Award to such Participant based upon the Compensation Committee&#146;s determination of such Participant&#146;s contribution to the Company. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>7.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TIMING OF AWARDS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">After approval of the Audit
Committee of the Board, it is the intent of the Board to distribute the Award, or actual shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock for Awards denominated in Performance Shares, for a Plan Year no later than March&nbsp;15 of the following year for
each Plan Year that Participants have become entitled to an Award. The terms and conditions of an Award denominated in Performance Shares will be set forth in a Performance Share Award Agreement with a Participant. A deceased Participant&#146;s
Award will be paid, or shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock underlying an Award denominated in Performance Shares will be distributed, to the beneficiary designated by the Participant for purposes of the Company&#146;s group term life insurance
plan covering the deceased Participant, and in the absence of any designation, will be paid or distributed to the Participant&#146;s estate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>8.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AMENDMENT </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board, acting through the
Compensation Committee, retains the right to modify the Plan at any time in any manner that it deems appropriate, provided that (a)&nbsp;no amendment that adversely affects the rights of Participants or their beneficiaries shall be effective for a
Plan Year that ended prior to the Plan Year in which the amendment was adopted, and (b)&nbsp;it will not terminate the Plan for any Plan Year during that Plan Year unless it is clear that Participants will not receive an Award for that Plan Year. It
is understood that the Compensation Committee of the Board will review the Plan yearly and may make changes to the Plan for the next Plan Year. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:18px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>9.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>MISCELLANEOUS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">a.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This memorandum, including its attachments, constitutes the entire understanding relating to an Award to any employee of Alaska or Horizon, and supersedes all prior oral or written
agreements, representations or commitments relating to such Awards. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">b.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This Plan is not a commitment of the Company, Alaska or Horizon, to any officer or employee of such company, to continue that individual in its employ in order to qualify for an
Award. Nothing contained in this Plan may be considered to be a promise of continued employment. Any employee who shall file suit against his or her employer for wrongful termination shall automatically cease to be a Participant.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">c.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event that a Participant has a written employment agreement with Alaska or Horizon which entitles such Participant to participate in the Management Incentive Plan, this Plan
is intended, for the purpose of such agreements, to be considered to be the same plan and may continue to be referred to as the MIP. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">d.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This memorandum and the rights and obligations provided for herein shall be construed and interpreted in accordance with the law of the state of Washington, excluding its conflicts
of law rules. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 of 8 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">e.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No unpaid Award will be subject to the debts, liabilities, contracts or engagements of any Participant, and may not be alienated, pledged, garnished or sold, and any attempt to do
so shall be void. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">f.</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Awards of Common Stock, Performance Shares, and the issuance of shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock underlying Awards of Performance Shares, are deemed to be made pursuant to
the Company&#146;s 2004 Long-Term Incentive Plan, or any such successor plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">
